definition: marked by intense personal feelings or emotions causing one to literally feel it in the viscera; gut wrenching
details:
adjective
- marked by intense personal feelings or emotions causing one to literally feel it in the viscera; gut wrenching
= example: marked by intense personal feelings or emotions causing one to literally feel it in the viscera; gut wrenching
= synonyms: intuitive
- relating to or affecting the viscera; guts
= example: relating to or affecting the viscera; guts
= synonyms: splanchnic
- relating to crude elements or emotions; earthy
= example: relating to crude elements or emotions; earthy
